properties.areaDesc: Wilson, TN; Sumner, TN; Trousdale, TN
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 6 at 1:51AM CST until February 7 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the
following rivers in Middle Tennessee...

Cumberland River At Hunters Point affecting Sumner...Trousdale and Wilson
Counties

.Heavy rainfall on Wednesday has caused the Cumberland River to rise above action
stage.

The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Cumberland River At Hunters Point
* At 1AM Thursday the stage was 48.1 feet.
* Action stage is 48.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 52.0 feet.
* The river will continue to rise to near 48.5 feet later today.
* At 48.0 feet...Areas along the river begin to be inundated from Beasleys Bend
in Wilson County downstream to Old Hickory Dam. This includes agricultural
land adjacent to the river, recreation areas, boat launch areas, and marinas
in Hendersonville, Old Hickory, Mount Juliet, Lauguardo, Lebanon, Gallatin,
and Castalian Springs.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
